name: Black Wizard Headwear
description: Under the broad brim of the hat, the magic crept, as if there were a voice whispering in the ear.

name: Blacksmith's Giftbox
description: A small giftbox for all the adventures from the Blacksmith Guild. "Wish your refining will always be successful!" Open to receive: 15 to 30 "Oridecon", 15 to 30 “Elunium”, and 100,000 Zeny

name: Blade
description: A sword with a thick blade is widely used.

name: Blade [2]
description: A sword with a thick blade is widely used.

name: Blair's Coin
description: A coin engraved with the challenger's name. It symbolizes honor and strength for dueling clubs.

name: Blazing soul·Dragon flame
description: Spear made from red dragon breath and Fire Crystal, every thrust is as powerful as the flaming breath of red dragons.

name: Blazing soul·Flaming dust
description: Jur made by rare fire crystal, the fire Core's blue fire burns ever bright.

name: Blazing soul·Flaming Shadow
description: Rod that possess the soul of fire Element, fire soul Core gives the rod endless magic power, weapon belong to the legendary fire wizard of Midgard.

name: Blazing soul·Fury of war
description: Axe born from the flame, possess the devastating power that can split lava, even demons are afraid of its blood burning terror.

name: Blazing soul·Hell blaze
description: Hammer fueled with power of fire, every Strike will bring shattering spark, even the gate of hell can not withstand its power.

name: Blazing soul·Red Guardian
description: Heavy shield covered in scorching Iron, it keeps emitting Blazing red light and a burning aura.

name: Blazing soul·Red king's scorching blade
description: Weapon of legendary hell swordsman Red king, blade made of Lava crystal can maintain its fiery temper even in the frozen ice, it will burn away anything comes toward its way.

name: Blazing soul·Scarlet Sky
description: Magical dagger that emit scorching power, when wielded it will become the fiery lava and burn out victim's soul and body.
